DOC.brief_summary: A double-blind, placebo Randomized Controlled Trial, To evaluate the effects of L. reuteri in adult patients with functional constipation.
DOC.brief_title: Lactobacillus Reuteri in Adult With Functional Chronic Constipation
DOC.detailed_description: Patients affected by functional constipation according to Rome III criteria. The increase of Bowel Movements/week frequency was the primary outcome, while the improvement of stool consistency was the secondary outcome.
DOC.criteria: functional constipation rome III hypothyroidism or other metabolic or renal abnormalities, or antibiotic's treatment, probiotic or prebiotic supplementation in the last month
